title: Vilnius Heat Plant
text:
Vilnius Heat Plant or Vilnius Power Plant-2 is a power plant in <a href="Vilnius">Vilnius</a>, Lithuania. Its capacity is 913 <a href="megawatt">megawatt</a>s (MW) heating power and 24 MW electric power. It is operated by Vilniaus Energija UAB, a subsidiary of <a href="Dalkia">Dalkia</a>.
The power plant is fueled by <a href="natural%20gas">natural gas</a> and <a href="heavy%20fuel%20oil">heavy fuel oil</a> (<a href="mazut">mazut</a>). There is a plan to transfer it to biofuel based on a mixture of <a href="wood">wood</a>, <a href="straw">straw</a> and <a href="peat">peat</a>.
